long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Answer customer queries wherever you are, email or chat, with Docket’s Chrome Plugin.

Docket is a leading AI Sales Engineer designed to learn from your organization’s tribal knowledge and respond to all your critical and complex client questions during sales processes. 

# Key Features

With Docket’s Chrome plugin, you can quickly answer the following:

Any questions posed by your clients on email or calls.
Answer product queries for support tickets on your helpdesks with Docket. 

Docket fills the gap between client queries and getting answers from your teammates for technical or complex product queries, leading to a smoother buying experience for your prospects and clients. 


# Trusted by Enterprise 

Docket is used by leading enterprise companies and SMBs. Companies like ZoomInfo and LivePerson use Docket daily as an assistant to interact with their sales pipeline. It follows the latest security checks to ensure your data is secured.

# Never Trains on Your Data

Docket never trains on your tribal knowledge or what’s on your screen. It only learns from your queries, responses, and interactions with the platform. Your data will always be yours, and it will only be accessed to give answers until you’re using Docket. 

# Verified Answers with references 

The Chrome plugin provides an experience that you’re used to. It works similarly to our Slack app and our web app. So you’ll be able to see your answers’ confidence scores and verification status and also get links to sales collaterals.
